exercise_description: Lie flat on a bench. Hold the bar slightly more than sholder width. Lift bar off rack, hold straight over you with arms locked. Lower bar by flexing elbows and inhaling. Move bar back up as exhaling.
Run for the prescribed distance or time.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Hold barbell across upper back with overhand grip. Bend knees and lower hips back and down. Continue down until thighs are parallel to floor. Return up.
Get on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips. Keep your back flat and your head up. Crawl forward for the prescribed distance.
Assume the classic push-up position, but place your hands on an exercise ball. Perform a push-up. Repeat for the prescribed number of repetitions.
